effects: 20% chance to counter physical attacks with Standby - Light (505040) to caster
20% chance to counter magic attacks with Standby - Light (505040) to caster
name: Standby - Light

desc_short.0: Add chance of reducing light resistance for enemy when receiving a physical or magic attack
desc_short.5: Puede reducir la res. a la luz de un enemigo al recibir un ataque físico o mágico
